channel.title: Need Some Help about making my server
channel.description:
Hey,
[b]Question 1.[/b]When i log in at my server it says welcome to SheezScape 80 how can i change that in to my server name ?
[b]Question 2.[/b] When i want to log out it says Please dont log out only if you have to :( How can i change that ?
[b]Question 3.[/b] How can i Delete hat santa what is selling Super rare's like phats ?? i want them rare :O
Thanks :)

item.title: Need Some Help about making my server
item.dc:creator: @VorargC VorargC
item.description:
@VorargC wrote:

Make sure your logged out,
open your character file
change it
save it
exit,
might have to compile server.

Read full topic
item.source: Need Some Help about making my server

item.description:
@Crispp wrote:

Oke last Question and then this could be closed

How can i make myself admin ?? because i have “0” playerrights on my own server and when i change it in 2 it change back to 0

Read full topic
item.source: Need Some Help about making my server

item.title: Need Some Help about making my server
item.dc:creator: @Alpha_X Alpha X
item.description:
@Alpha_X wrote:

Hey,

Question 1.When i log in at my server it says welcome to SheezScape 80 how can i change that in to my server name ?

Question 2. When i want to log out it says Please dont log out only if you have to How can i change that ?

Question 3. How can i Delete hat santa what is selling Super rare’s like phats ?? i want them rare

Thanks

  1. Just press ctrl + H on your keyboard and type in cheezscape and replace with your server name.

  2. Search for please don’t log out for the logout message and edit that stuff there.

  3. Go to shops.cfg and look for the item id and edit from there.

Read full topic
item.source: Need Some Help about making my server

item.title: Need Some Help about making my server
item.dc:creator: @VorargC VorargC
item.description:
@VorargC wrote:

Ok,
In player.java
find something like this Player start point
Then you will see coords
like

teleportToX = 3254;//Player start point teleportToY = 3420;//Player start point

Just change the numbers to where you want to spawn

Read full topic

2. same thing
3. delete the item # from the shop list.
